title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game ZoneX.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game ZoneX.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: In the dim light of a forgotten armory, a sleek SMG catches your eye. Its body is adorned with a stealthy camouflage pattern, a perfect blend of dark greens and blacks, designed for blending in shadows. The lightweight construction promises agility, while the robust stock provides stability, ensuring precise shots in tight situations. As you grip the textured handle, the weight feels just right; it's an extension of your will. The whisper of anticipation fills the air as you load the magazine, ready to unleash a volley of fire. This weapon isn’t just a tool—it's your ticket to survival in a perilous world.
